sentences.en: It was a small room on the ground floor, with a tiny window under the stairway.
sentences.cn: 那是在底层的一个小房间，楼梯下面有一扇小窗户。

sentences.en: Deta, ringing again, saw a girl with a brilliant white cap on her head, coming down the stairway.
sentences.cn: 迪蒂又按了一次铃，看见一个头上戴着漂亮白帽子的姑娘从楼梯上下来。

sentences.en: Injun Joe put his hand on his knife, halted a moment, undecided, and then turned toward the stairway.
sentences.cn: 印第安·乔手里拿着刀，站了一会儿，拿不定主意，然后转身朝楼梯走去。
